title: #200 - Bill Burr, Tom Segura, & ME
description:
MY 200th EPISODE!!!

Comedians Bill Burr & Tom Segura hang out in the Mancave for a cigar and some Bourbon - we talk sports, fat shaming, hunting, and regretful Wu-Tang Trains.

This podcast is brought to you by:

My Showtime Special "The Machine" Airing November 11th at 10pm

ME: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Zane Lamprey's Adventure Hoodie: ADV3NTURE.com/HOODI3S
